title: What are the best words of wisdom or blessings your elders have given you? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some people are lucky to start life with a “starting balance" in moral value account and bank account, deposited by parents and others . I am one of the unlucky ones ,to start with zero balance in both these accounts. I am sure that I am not the only one who started like this. Many or most of richest people today , spiritually as well as financially, started from scratch. Did these “ zero balnces” effect me , yes the journey throughout was difficult but was possible. I am still suffering due to lack of guidance in the early stages of life. I am happy that my mental assets are much bigger than physical ones, which is also not bad. Let me just briefly touch upon few points of wisdom , which I picked up my self during the course of journey so far. Appreciate how wonderful this life is and people around us . Think what small percentage of these gifts we are really using , try to increase your reachHave a clean heart , devoid of jealosy and I'll feelings to othersMental and physical health is foremost to any thing we do in life . Belief in some power above us , call it GOD or any thing helps , as I realised lateBe positive mentally and physically in the sense try to do some thing always , learning some thing or doing something . Constantly update your goals . The possibilities are endlessBe connected with the Earth and people . Unfortunately many of our young generation are not .Learn to appreciate Good music , Art , literature . Good food , gardening and Farming. It is a magical universeLearn from past mistakes , don’neglect them also let them overweight youI am happy my collection of “ wisdom” is increasing even when I try to share these lines .,

I'm not that experienced a person with wisdom and all but my grandparents used to say these to all of us regularly and so these words have been etched in my heart :) Their words have always enlightened me and I'm hoping they help many more here...1) Try and try till you succeed.2)When you start to think if you deserve better, you definitely do, and work for it.3)The man who respects you, will love you forever and deserves you.4)Never scum to injustice, immoral behaviour.5)It doesn't matter if you are a guy or a girl... U need to learn to do everything..from fitting a leaking tap to cooking... no work is 'his' or 'her' work.6)Respect everyone and their opinions even if you don't agree with them.7)Help those who need you but don't let people take you for granted.8)Live your life with pride but never ego.9)Trust yourself and your instincts over the views of others.10)Believe in your efforts and leave the rest to god.11)Aim for the moon so that even if you miss you reach the stars. 12)Don't depend o anyone to protect you or work for you, become capable in all the ways.13)Believe in 'sharing the load'.Thanks...
